price: ߥߟߊߞߏ߫ ߌ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߣߵߊ߲ ߡߊ߬ ߞߋ߲ߛߐ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߣߴߌ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ ߕߌ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
